name: philkr.GitHub.io
body:
### Random Experiments (successful and failed ones)
I'll start to list some random experiments I thought would be interesting, but not interesting enough to make it into a paper.

## Image recolorization
I was curious if we would train a convolutional neural network to predict color from a gray scale image. The results were a bit mixed. While it is possible to do this on a very restrictive domain, such as the MPI sintel, it doesn't work at all on general images (eg COCO or Imagenet).
A quick summary of this can be found here:
